channel.title: Which Laptop is better?!?!?!
channel.description:
http://www.newegg.com/Product/Productcompare.aspx?Submit=ENE&N=100006740&IsNodeId=1&bop=And&ActiveSearchResult=True&CompareItemList=32|34-246-153^34-246-153-TS%2C34-230-089^34-230-089-TS
***([u][b]just copy and paste it all of it, do not click on the blue text link[/b][/u])***
please help me choose which one is better.

item.title: Which Laptop is better?!?!?!
item.dc:creator: @xryz xryz
item.description:
@xryz wrote:

its ok. just make sure thats what u want. have u looked though multiple different laptops? have u considered how long u plan to keep this new laptop till u buy a new computer, so it be able to handle the future software(i mean it should)? just hope u get a nice laptop. i have a decent one but cant play very good games. it costed somewhere over $700 but i didnt buy it, my gma did. i should have asked her if i could of ordered one of the internet for the same price, instead of getting it from radioshack. i need to reinstall windows 7 b/c ive installed too much junk on this one.

its ok about the rep.

Read full topic

item.title: Which Laptop is better?!?!?!
item.dc:creator: @visiblesound visiblesound
item.description:
@visiblesound wrote:

xryz:

personally 4 gigs of ram is plenty, and the gfx card is better. u can always upgrade the ram, u cant upgrade the gfx card. plus the lenovo has so many more features that i listed in the previous post.

well tysm, because of you i know my next laptop, i just wish i had 15 rep so i could ++rep u =(

Read full topic

item.title: Which Laptop is better?!?!?!
item.dc:creator: @visiblesound visiblesound
item.description:
@visiblesound wrote:

ok so guys it really comes down to this:

  1. 6GB RAM nvidia GT 540M
  2. 4GB RAM nvidia GT 555M

what in your opinion should i go with.

Read full topic

item.title: Which Laptop is better?!?!?!
item.dc:creator: @xryz xryz
item.description:
@xryz wrote:

[quote=“visiblesound, post:3, topic:402231”][quote author=xryz link=topic=499287.msg3651260#msg3651260 date=1309746347]
i would say out of those 2 laptops the lenovo is better the only thing better the asus has to offer is it has 6 gig instead of 4 gig of ddr3.
[/quote]

according to the stats the lenovo actually has DDR5 so…idk[/quote]

gddr5 for the gfx card. its ddr3 if u look down on the starts. also the lenovo has this gfx card http://www.notebookcheck.net/NVIDIA-GeForce-GT-555M.41933.0.html while the asus has this card http://www.notebookcheck.net/NVIDIA-GeForce-GT-540M.41715.0.html

edit: also has more benefits, speakers: Internal 2 x 1.5W JBL Brand Speakers with Chamber; card reader: 6-in-1 card reader (SD / SD Pro / MMC / MS / MS Pro / XD); touchpad: Multi-touch touchpad; camera: 2.0MP; usb: 1 x USB 3.0, 2 x USB 2.0, 1 x eSATA/USB combo port; other features: Wireless Display support, Bluetooth 2.1. the only thing the asus has that the lenovo doesnt is a 1gig NIC.

Read full topic
